      • onConflict

        public void onConflict(java.util.SortedSet<MapItem> hitItems)
        Description copied from interface: MapTouchController.DeconflictionListener
        Fired when there is a conflict. The caller can manipulate the sorted set for the deconfliction menu. No deconfliction menu is shown if the set is of length 0/1 or if skipDeconfliction is set.
        Specified by:
        onConflict in interface MapTouchController.DeconflictionListener
        Parameters:
        hitItems - the non-null set that is provided for possible manipulation by the implementaion.
